author: Staff Reporter
text:
The tusker that was found dead near Mettupalayam on Wednesday. -Special arrangement

A male tusker aged about 20 years was found dead at Kurumbanur village near Nellithurai Reserve Forest in Mettupalayam Range on Wednesday. The animal was among a herd of five elephants that was roaming in that area.

On Wednesday morning, villagers saw the animal dead and informed the Forest Department.

District Forest Officer (DFO) in-charge of Coimbatore, C.H. Padma said a post-mortem showed different types of worms in the elephant’s intestine.
title: Tusker found dead
